entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
